verses.roman:
ei prema-dvāre nitya rādhikā ekali
āmāra mādhuryāmṛta āsvāde sakali

synonyms: ei—this; prema-dvāre—by means of the love; nitya—always; rādhikā—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; ekali—only; āmāra—of Me; mādhurya-amṛta—the nectar of the sweetness; āsvāde—tastes; sakali—all.
translation: "Only Rādhikā, by the strength of Her love, tastes all the nectar of My sweetness.
